_description: William of Shoreham, ‘De Septem Sacramentis’, etc. — 320 7-line stanzas

BLAdd17376.First Lines: Sonder liche his man astonesIn his owene mende…
BLAdd17376.Last Lines:
…And for þe tokene þat we nemeLat ouse þy dole
                    songe
BLAdd17376.Editions:

             The Poems of William of Shoreham.
Percy Society
         28. London: Richard, 1849: 1-81.
